ARABIC: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٍ لَّا تَحْمِلُ رِزْقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرْزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمْ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: How many creatures do not carry their provision with them! Allah provides for them and He will for you. He is the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How many living things there are on the earth that do not Store their food; God provides them as well as you. He is all-hearing and all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: How many an animal there is that does not carry about its sustenance. Allah provides sustenance to them and to you. He is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There are many living creatures which do not carry their sustenance, but God provides them and you with sustenance. He is All-hearing and All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And many creatures walk upon the earth that do not carry their own sustenance; Allah provides the sustenance to them and to you; and only He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And so many a moving creature carries not its own provision! Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And how many a living creature that does not carry its sustenance: Allah sustains it and yourselves; and He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: How many a beast that bears not its own provision, but God provides for it and you! He is the All-hearer, the All-knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And how many an animal there is that beareth not its own provision! Allah provideth for it and for you. He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: How many creatures cannot fend for themselves! God provides for them and for you. He is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And how many a moving creature there is that beareth not its provision! Allah provideth for it and for you. And He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: How many an animal there is that does not carry its own provision. Allah provides them and you, and He is the All-hearing, the All-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: How many are the creatures that carry not their own sustenance? It is Allah who feeds (both) them and you: for He hears and knows (all things).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And so many a moving (living) creature there is, that carries not its own provision! Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the All-Hearer, the All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: How many a beast does not bear its own provision. Allah provides for it, as (He provides) for you. He is the Hearer, the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: How many a creature there is that does not carry its provision? God provides for them, and for you. He is the Hearer, the Knowledgeable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:60] And how many (ka-ayyin means kam) an animal there is that does not bear its own provision, on account of its inability [to do so]. Yet God provides for it, and for you, O Emigrants (al-muhājirūn), even when you carry with you neither supplies nor substance. And He is the Hearer, of your sayings, the Knower, of your consciences.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: But when Allah commanded them to migrate to Medina, they said: "we do not have anyone there to give us shelter, food or drink". And so Allah said: (And how many an animal there is that beareth not its own provision) for the morrow, except ants who store their yearly provision! (Allah provideth for it) for the animal that stores its provision and the animal that does not (and for you) believers. (He is the Hearer) when you say: "who will provide for us?", (the Knower) of your sustenance; He knows from whence to provide for you.
